text: Verkh-Usugli () is a rural locality (a selo) and the administrative center of Tungokochensky District of Zabaykalsky Krai, Russia. Population: ==Geography== The village is about 320 km northeast of the regional capital Chita. It is on the bank of the Usugli River.Verkh-Usugli in the Encyclopedia Transbaikaliens (Russian) ==History== The founding of the village is associated with the discovery in 1936 of the Usuglinsky fluorite deposit by S. K. Sobolev. In 1959-66, the Usugli mine was constructed. ==References== Category:Rural localities in Zabaykalsky Krai Category:1936 establishments in the Soviet Union
title: Verkh-Usugli
